statements: SELECT * FROM claims_info;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims_info ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_info WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims_info WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims_info WHERE claim_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims_info WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_info WHERE claim_status='pending' ORDER BY claim_id;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims_info WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_info WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' AND claim_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims_info WHERE claim_amount > 2000 ORDER BY claim_status, claim_id;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status='Pending';
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status, status_change_date, previous_status, new_status FROM claims JOIN claim_history ON claims.claim_id = claim_history.claim_id;
SELECT claim_id, count(history_id) AS status_changes FROM claims LEFT JOIN claim_history ON claims.claim_id = claim_history.claim_id GROUP BY claim_id HAVING count(history_id) > 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims UNION SELECT NULL AS claim_id, 'Total' AS claim_date, SUM(claim_amount) AS claim_amount, NULL AS claim_status FROM claims;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE status='Approved';
SELECT claimant_name, email_address FROM Claimants WHERE contact_number='1234567890';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, status FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT c.claim_id, cd.claim_status, cd.claim_resolution_date FROM Claims c INNER JOIN ClaimDetails cd ON c.claim_id = cd.claim_id WHERE cd.claim_status='Resolved';
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE status='Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, status FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claimant_name, contact_number, email_address FROM Claimants WHERE claimant_id > 100;
SELECT c.claim_id, cd.claimant_id, cd.claim_status FROM Claims c JOIN ClaimDetails cd ON c.claim_id = cd.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claimants WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM Claimants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT note_id, note_text, created_at FROM ClaimNotes ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount ASC;
SELECT claimant_id, full_name FROM Claimants WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, status FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 AND status = 'Approved';
SELECT cn.note_id, c.full_name, cn.note_text FROM ClaimNotes cn JOIN Claimants c ON cn.claim_id = c.claimant_id;
SELECT ci.image_id, c.full_name, ci.image_url FROM ClaimImages ci JOIN Claimants c ON ci.claim_id = c.claimant_id ORDER BY ci.image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_info;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_info WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM claimants WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM employees ORDER BY emp_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM claims_info;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims_info ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM claimants WHERE claim_id = 3;
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM employees WHERE emp_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY emp_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount), MIN(payment_amount) FROM payments;
